name: Red Heart
meaning: The Red Heart emoji represents love, affection, romance, and deep emotional connection between people.

chat_examples.person_a: Thank you for being there for me

fun_fact: The ❤️ Red Heart emoji is one of the most used emojis worldwide and is often considered the universal symbol of love, appearing in billions of messages every day.

faqs.q: What does the ❤️ Red Heart emoji mean?
faqs.a: It represents love, affection, romance, and emotional closeness.
It is primarily romantic but can also express deep care and affection.

faqs.q: Can ❤️ be used with friends or family?
faqs.a: Yes, it is commonly used to show love and care toward close friends and family.
Generally no, as it is considered personal and emotionally expressive.
Not always. It can also represent appreciation, support, or emotional warmth.

faqs.q: Why is ❤️ the most popular heart emoji?
faqs.a: Because it universally represents love and is instantly understood across cultures.
Rarely. It is almost always interpreted as genuine affection.

faqs.q: Does ❤️ look the same on all platforms?
faqs.a: Designs vary slightly, but the meaning remains the same.

when_to_use: Use this emoji to express love, affection, emotional support, or deep appreciation.
when_not_to_use: Avoid using it in formal, professional, or emotionally sensitive conversations where affection may be inappropriate.
